title: Maven Quarkus plugin create an apps pointing to the wrong version
body:
### Describe the bug

If I create an app pointing to Quarkus 2.2.3.Final as the [documentation](https://quarkus.io/version/2.2/guides/deploying-to-openshift) says

```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.2.3.Final:create \                              
    -DprojectGroupId=org.acme \
    -DprojectArtifactId=openshift-quickstart \
    -DclassName="org.acme.rest.GreetingResource" \
    -Dpath="/greeting" \
    -Dextensions="resteasy,openshift"
```

I expected to have a `pom.xml`  pointing to `2.2.3.Final` however is pointing to `2.5.0.Final`


### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_
